public class BCKImageControl
extends JButton
implements MouseMotionListener
Description A JButton that you get display an ImageIcon on. It may also be picked up and moved.

Constructor.

Constructor.

getCenter()
Returns the Centre of the JButton as a point

Returns true if this Component is selected

Static method that returns ImageIcon given a string which represents the path and the file

The event that happens when the mouse is dragged over the component.
mouseMoved(MouseEvent)
This component implements MouseMotionListener so must implement this method

Sets the image to display on the Component
setSelected(boolean)
Set the component selected true or false
